text: Let G be a graph where each edge has 2 weight functions w and v, where v(e) = w(e) + 1 for each edge e â‚¬ G. Now consider the following two statements: (i) If tree T is a minimum spanning tree using weight function v, it is also a minimum spanning tree using weight function w. (ii) If tree T is a shortest path tree using weight function v, it is also a shortest path tree using weight function w. Which of the following statement is true? (a) Only i (b) Only ii (c) Both i & ii (d) Neither i nor ii
